fields.summary: Hyperloop: Android - Java primitives arrays are wrapped in hyperloop proxies improperly

comments.body:
Verified the fix.

{code}
var Build = require('android.os.Build');
Build.SUPPORTED_ABIS[0];
{code}
does not fail & logging in gives {{armeabi-v7a}}

Closing.

Environment:
Appc Studio : 4.7.0.201607111053
Ti SDK :  5.4.0.v20160720132422
Ti CLI : 5.0.9
Alloy : 1.9.1
MAC El Capitan : 10.11.5
Appc NPM : 4.2.8-1
Appc CLI : 5.4.0-33
Node: 4.4.4
Nexus 5 - Android 6.0.1
